name: Cross Stitch Beta
description:
A cross stitch simulator! Now with a custom colour picker (Not mine, credited below), the ability to save colours on a custom palette, and to take screen shots!

Screen shots can be obtained by going into the Cross Stitch Game_Data folder, then the SnapShots folder. The folder will not exist until a snapshot is taken.

Special thanks to Judah4, who's colour picker I used.

https://forum.unity.com/threads/color-picker.267043/
